summary: Three part Vampire and Greybeard themed cave to reach High Hrothgar
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]High Hrothgar Alternate Cave Route[/size]
[size=5]Latest version 1.5

[img]https://s25.postimg.cc/md4b3kq0v/image.jpg[/img]
Green Cave - Ice Cave - Old Hrothgar Ruins[/size]

[size=3]After climbing the 7000 steps for probably a ten dozen times in my various attempts to beat Skyrim I decided to add an alternate route to the Greybeards. It's composed of a three part cave dungeon located east of Whiterun using a Vampire and Greybeard themed ambiance. Level 1 is occupied by passionate vampire symphatizers level 2 by vampires and the new Old Hrothgar Ruins level by ancient Greybeards. All enemies are leveled and use their own daily routine.
Klimmek will have to deliver the supplies on his own for once.

[img]https://s25.postimg.cc/dr5kff2nz/map01.jpg[/img]

[youtube]Ogor0x9BVTE[/youtube]
Video by Thyworm - Thanks
Note: The video covers only the 1st and 2nd cave.

Requirements: Skyrim esm no dlc needed.

Installation: NMM or manually unzip and paste esp in the data folder.
Uninstallation: remove the file.

Changelog:
1.0 Initial release
1.2 Added part three of the cave
1.4 Added more enemies - some improvements here and there
1.5 More improvements
